transcript:
Executive: Ji madam. This call is now being recorded.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello. Good morning sir, Kavita Rawat this side from IndiaMART.
Customer: Ji boliye madam.
Executive: Sir call kar rahe the aap customer care pe?
Customer: Ji madam. Ji bataiye kya problem aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ho gaya tha baat mera.
Customer: Ho gaya tha madam baat ho gaya tha wo mere ko GST ke liye tha wo India mart ke jo license tha unhone kaha ki GST compulsory hai.
Executive: To subscription to hai na aapka already?
Customer: Nahi is number pe hai mera ek aur license hai us pe lena tha mere ko garlic purchasing ka kam hai mera.
Executive: Ha ha.
Customer: Uske liye lena tha to fir meri baat ho gayi thi customer care number pe.
Executive: To le liya aapne subscription us pe?
Customer: Nahi madam usme GST nahi hai na.
Executive: Achcha achcha achcha. To main yahan se ticket close kar du aapki?
Customer: Ha abhi to close kariye na madam kyuki jab tak GST nahi aayega tab tak kuch nahi kar sakte.
Executive: Aur dekhiye agar aapko koi bhi doubt hota hai na kuch bhi hota hai to aap mujhe call kariye aapke pass mera number hai na as a account manager aapko mujhe connect karna hai aap agar apne is number se bhi 9696 pe call karte hai na to Sardar Patel fabric industry se hi aapki ticket open hogi.
Customer: Ji madam.
Executive: To abhi ke liye main aapki ticket close kar rahi hu in future koi bhi problem hoti hai aapko services se related to aap mujhe connect kariye baki ticket close ka aapke pass message aayega aap us pe apna feedback share kar sakte hain sir theek hai?
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Okay sir thank you thank you so much sir.
Customer: Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs GST for another license.



Resolution:

- Executive closed the ticket.

- Executive asked to connect for any issues.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- gst, subscription, ticket closure
